directions: Combine water, leeks, potatoes, salt, and black pepper in a large saucepan; bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat to low, partially cover saucepan, and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 1 hour.
Blend soup using an immersion blender until smooth. Season with more salt and pepper as needed. Stir in milk and hot sauce before serving.
ingredients: 3 cups chopped leeks (white and light green parts only)
2 teaspoons sea salt, or to taste
2 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper, or to taste
10 drops hot sauce (such as Goya® Salsa Picante), or to taste
title: Potato-Leek Soup
